Title: Establishes a new housing court part for one to four family homes
Summary: Establishes a new housing court part for one to four family homes within county courts throughout the state and within the New York city civil court system.
LawCode: Add ยง209, Judy L; amd ยง110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law and the New York city civil court act, in relation to establishing a new housing court part for certain homes
